title: ISic001416. Funerary inscription of Attinis
body:
1menorah
2Ἀττίν-
3ις βρε<σ>β-
4ύτερο-
5ς

l.3 reg., orig. βρεσβ ύτερο ς

1menorah
2ΑΤΤΙΝ
3ΙΣΒΡΕΒ
4ΥΤΕΡΟ
5Σ

l.3 reg., orig. βρεσβ ύτερο ς

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text after Brugnone and photograph;
  • 3: Brugnone: βρ<ε>σβ; lapis: βρϲβ, and since elsewhere lunate sigma is quadrate while epsilon is lunate, a weakly incised epsilon and omitted sigma seems more likely

English translation

Jonathan Prag

Attinis, (the) elder

commentary

Presbuteros with initial B is also attested in ISic003631 (Siracusa). The inscription is for a member of the council of elders within the local jewish community. The form Attinis is not otherwise documented.

  • Bonomi 1964 200 fig.35 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002127
  • Brugnone 2002 297-298 no.3 fig.4 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002118
